title: Font Help Again
content:
Need help with this one guy's the best or closest i could find was UnitedSansSemiExt-Heavy but it wasn't quite right.  
If anyone does know this font I would appreciate it. Looking for the SPORTS and Live txt.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115074454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FS1_4C_4666.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115074454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fox%20sports%20llive%20logo_5004.jpg)
author: JimC

comments.content:
Part of some peeky and easy to reproduce details, that definitely looks like United for me. I guess FOX is big enough to commission a designer to modify United and make it (a bit more) memorable and unique.  
Have a look [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115074454/http:/typophile.com/node/105488#comment-562631) if you need more fonts in the same vein of United.
OH well found the answer to my own question :) Its a special font named Uscore for FOX only.
